Traits.Name: Skirmisher
Traits.Description: Can move diagonally and dash action is full speed.

Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Traits.Name: Stuttering Horror
Traits.Description: The Izenghast teleports 1 in any direction after a foe takes an action.

Traits.Name: Ethereal
Traits.Description: Phasing, and has evasion unless there's an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 must save. On a failed save, they lose all vigor, and the Izenghast gains vigor 1. If that foe has no vigor, they take [D] on a successful save, or 2[D] on a failed save.

Actions.Name: Shriek
Actions.Description: The Izenghast releases a horrible shriek, a close blast 1 area effect. Characters in the area must save or take 4[D], or 2[D] on a successful save. Reduce this damage by [D] for every character past the first in the area. The Izenghast can take this action as an interrupt if defiance triggers, even if it hasn't recharged.
